title: Luxury Hotels in Pahalgam Promise Guests a Pleasurable Sojourn (Varunesh Singh)
text: By Varunesh Singh Sep 21, 2015 For that utterly pleasurable, unforgettable sojourn among the virgin snows of Kashmir, against the backdrop of magnificent mountains, enchanting sylvan beauty and gurgling rivers, come get a slice of paradise. Picturesque Pahalgam promises you a holiday to remember, memories to treasure and the pleasure of perfect bliss. Situated approximately 90 kilometers from the state capital of Srinagar, this world famous hill station is situated on the banks of the Lidder River, at a height of over 7,000 feet above sea level. Luxury hotels in Pahalgam lavishly endowed with a melange of modern comforts to ensure an enhanced stay for travellers and strategically located in the best location in Pahalgam , invite you with pleasure and look after you with pride!Such luxury hotels in Pahalgam , perched prettily on the banks of the gurgling river Lidder and providing the best location in Pahalgam for a relaxed and leisurely holiday where you enjoy the ambient beauty of Nature, provide a variety of luxurious accommodation options. These encapsulate charming and cosy deluxe rooms, lavish deluxe suites and delightful deluxe cottages, where you can enjoy complete privacy with your loved one!The compact and brightly illuminated deluxe rooms with their rich wooden interiors and furnishings, intricately worked Kashmiri carpet and drapes with exquisite crewel work embroidery, invite you for a cosy cuddle in the spacious bed with its warm coverings. With a dressing table and chair and smart LED television with Tata Sky, these centrally heated rooms with their choice of pillows, their spacious bathrooms loaded with classy premium bath amenities culled from natural ingredients, 24-hour in room dining and work desk with lamp, acquiesce to your work or leisure needs with equal aplomb!Other utilitarian amenities here include a handy tea/coffee maker to provide that warming cuppa immediately, wi-fi service and iron and ironing board and for those of you who have toddlers or babies, even rollaway beds and cribs are available on request! With 24 hours laundry, robes and hairdryer on request, twice daily housekeeping service for cleaning and turning down the covers, make this a haven to live in!Whereas the uniquely decorated and lavishly spaced deluxe suites with their exceptionally designed beds and mirror, a marvellous ceiling that captures and holds your attention and contemporary chic enhanced by the traditional crafts of Kashmir, has also a living room where you can relax with a welcome cup of Kahwa or a drink, with close friends. Or proceed to the charismatic cottages, with their three elegantly furnished bedrooms, its lush lawns from where you can gaze in fascination as the mists roll in over the majestic mountains! Or wander into the delightful coffee shop with its appetizing snacks and hot drinks or the sumptuously decorated fine dining restaurant with its equally sumptuous Indian, Continental, Chinese, Gujarati and Kashmiri cuisines in luxury hotels in Pahalgam . About the Author After exploring many places in India with family, he realized he loves to travel. He extensively writes about hotels & Resorts for benefiting vacationers.
